# NIErrorDomain

**Global Variable**

A unique error domain for Nearby Interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
let NIErrorDomain: String
```

## Discussion

For more information on Core Foundation error domains, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreFoundation/error-domains].

## Errors

- **NIError**: An error Nearby Interaction reports.
- **NIError.Code**: Codes that identify errors in Nearby Interaction.

items.description: Codes that identify errors in Nearby Interaction.
